results.title: Pharmacokinetic comparison of sitagliptin and metformin HCl extended-release tablets versus JANUMET  XR in healthy volunteers under fasting and fed conditions
results.text_hl: A more affordable form of this drug may benefit an immense @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@ population.
